alert.note: Alert for East Honolulu; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 2:42PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM HST... At 241 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Honolulu, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Honolulu, Waimanalo, Kaneohe Marine Base, Hawaii Kai, Palolo, Kahaluu, Ahuimanu, Kailua, Manoa, Maunawili, Kaneohe, Kalihi, Moanalua, Salt Lake, Koko Crater, Iwilei, Waikiki, Honolulu Airport, Kalama Valley, and Aina Haina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Honolulu; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Olomana
